reviews.comment: Customer service was very nice. The prices were ok.  I haven't had good caribbean food  in a long time so I was excited about finding this restaurant. I was very disappointed with the food. I had goat soup and oxtails rice and peas. The goat soup was ok. It lacked goat meat and was more dumplings but the soup was very well seasoned. The oxtails rice and peas not very good. The rice was hard and it didn't have to authentic coconut milk seasoned taste. It had a burnt rice smell and taste. The oxtails were soft but not tasty.  I will be going to Golden Krust or another restaurant further down main street next time.
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURtLUp2S1R3EAE

reviews.comment: Oxtails, wow, best around 3 neighboring counties!!  I have to stop by when I'm up that way...

reviews.comment: This is the best food in all of Poughkeepsie/Dutchess county NY. I could eat here daily. Plenty of variety. I hope when I visit the Caribbean the food will taste as good as this place.

reviews.comment:
The food is okay at best. I say this because it's often a hit or miss. Usually you receive under seasoned food but on rare occasions you get a good batch. I love supporting small business but the customer service here is more times than not absolutely horrible.  Good customer service means repeated customer.
The last time I ordered take away from here I found a hair in my rice. I currently have blue hair so it definitely wasn't mine.

reviews.comment: Sylvia’s has the best authentic Jamaican food I have had so far in the US. The jerk chicken, Escovitch and brown stew fish, oxtail and rice and peas was awesome. I 100% recommend this restaurant for the authentic Jamaican food experience

reviews.comment: My husband ordered curried goat, rice & peas with gravy and cabbage. It seemed to take him back the time he visited Jamaica. Not one piece of rice left! He drank a pineapple soda and a pineapple ginger soda. I ordered a vegetarian patty, plantains and Rasta pasta. Devine! I had guava and carrot juice - yum! I happily give Montego Bay a five start rating, but it truly deserves a ten!

reviews.comment:
I have been to Sylvia's many times and I must say, without a doubt, that Sylvia's Jamaican restaurant is the best place to get jamaican food in the (845) area.

Authenticity 5-star
Quality 5-star
Taste 5-star
Service 5-Star
Staff 5-star

I have nothing terrible to say about this wonderful establishment. The staff is sincere and respectful. The quality and taste of food is better than any competing West Indian/Jamaican restaurants in the near-by vicinity. As a Jamaican myself, I really appreciate how they focus on the Authenticity of the taste of the food and not try to cater too much to an American audience by changing the recipe. They're formula has proven that authentic Jamaican can be succesful. I will continue to be a strong supporter of this restaurant and I strongly advise anyone looking for REAL Jamaican cuisine, to stop by(or call ahead) and try their food. You will not be disappointed
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUQycXVXQjV3RRAB

reviews.comment: Wonderful establishment, reminds of the Caribbean restaurants I dine at when in Miami. Cowfoot on Fridays, Ox Tails, Cirry Goat and jerk. I'm in heaven with choices like this
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUQya0pDNHVBRRAB

reviews.comment:
If you are in the area, make the stop to Sylvia’s! I usually got there on my lunch break. The jerk pork and chicken are so tender with a nice kick, plantains are out of this world and the oxtail (never had it before Sylvia’s and now usually what I order) !Sizes are huge and be sure to try the Beet drink.

Nothing but smiles and good food! Also, be sure to check out the Jamaican banners and prayers, always a good read.

reviews.comment: Best Caribbean food in Poughkeepsie. Portion is less than other restaurants in the area but enough to fill your stomach. Savory stew chicken. Freshly cooked fried chicken, curry chicken and goat, oxtail with rice and beans dishes are few among the popular items offered. Best place for a quick bite or pick up your lunch or eat in the restaurant for dinner. Good friendly customer service.

Sorry bought 3 large oxtail meals today and the food wasn’t even edible. Literally tasted like someone white cooked this meal. The rice and peas was horrible and tasted like straight garlic. Very fresh with no salt added, gravy was like water and oxtail could’ve used a little more color.
I ended up making a grill cheese

reviews.comment: NICEST PEOPLE HERE! Fantastic food. Every time I have visited, the customers and the staff are always incredibly sweet - one person even went out of her way to check for me if they had beef patties left! The beef patties are amazing, the mixed veggies and cabbage were seasoned so well. Fried plantains were good, and the oxtail was delicious! They usually have limited stocks of food, which is okay even if I miss out on some food because then you know it's fresh. If you want all the good stuff (like the dumplings usually sell out quick), come here exactly at or their posted breakfast and lunch times!

reviews.comment: I love Jamaican good. There are a few spots here in Poughkeepsie NY. Sylvia's is one of the best Jamaican restaurants in NY. I ordered oxtails, rice and peas, cabbage today with a beef patty nd cheese on cocoa bread. There cocoa bread and patties are so fresh they never disappoint. There oxtails... fall off the bone literally, always fresh and delicious.  There customer service and atmosphere always welcoming, great place to visit if you are in the area.

reviews.comment: Oxtails, rice and peas, cabbage and meat pie. All authentic and I enjoyed it all. The only thing I shared off this meal is the picture. You know it's good when they care enough to deliver the same quality they serve in the restaurant.
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUNMdHJyOFR3EAE

reviews.comment:
Been going here for over a decade, Food is usually great and have no problem but I had such a bad customer service experience I had to leave a review.
Called around 5:30pm asking if they still have stew chicken available. I was told no by a young lady on the phone but she then mentions that they are cooking some right at this moment. I proceeded to ask her how long do you think until its ready and she immediately tells me, "I don't know, i'm not a chef" with a terrible attitude.
I couldn't believe she even said that, and then she tries back tracking after realizing that was somewhat rude & tells me she'll find out the ETA right now. Told her don't bother, lost a customer that day that would've waited up 30mins.
Kinda lives up to the stereotypical Jamaican restaurant, great tasing food, terrible customer service.

reviews.comment: Curry goat is terrible. Taste like wet dog food. Taste the same every time. Overprice place. Never again.

reviewReply.comment: Hi Kim sorry to hear the Curry goat was not to your liking. The Goat is one of our most popular menu. We try to price our food to make it affordable to everyone. A $9.00 goat meal is considered reasonable.

reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURScC1pMEx3EAE

reviews.comment: Good ! Curry chicken was ok. They are very friendly and nice. You will get your money worth
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURSc0x2dlp3EAE

reviews.comment: A friend of mine told me his long time friend owns this restaurant.  I've been dying to check it out because I love Jamaican food...especially the breakfasts. The owner served me . He was so kind, polite and very soft spoken. I was compelled to buy everything they had cooked. I left with 3 breakfast and 2 dinners. I could not get home fast enough to eat my Acker and salt fish  callaloo,  banana and yam. It was amazing ! I will absolutely 💯 % go back there !!!!!!
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURCaThMM0hBEAE

reviews.comment: I love this place! always get a real Jamaican fix there. The staff are  great, The fruitcake is amazing. everything is solid.
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUQtOUt5c013EAE

reviews.comment: Food was good, service was prompt...the place could use some updating..

reviewReply.comment: Thank you so much. We are actually looking into that.

reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUNlbU1xbWt3RRAB

reviews.comment: Great atmosphere, lovely staff and amazing service. Food is delicious and reasonably priced.
reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUMtX0lPZUh3EAE

reviews.comment: Last night I stopped by Sylvia’s Jamaican Restaurant to see if they had oxtails. Omg they did!! The very friendly gentleman (may have been the owner) gave me a sample. It was so delicious! I took a very generous amount home to share with hubby. He loved it and he is very picky eater. Please go try it. I can’t wait to go back and try other dishes.

reviewReply.comment: We are so glad that you enjoyed it! Thank you so much for stopping by Nada and we can’t wait to see you again

reviews.name: accounts/113125786415732178818/locations/11630302524519852185/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURld2VXY19RRRAB

reviews.comment: Good ol fine jerk. Service was great. Marinade was one the best.
